price: Kandi abenshi muri bo nta kindi bakurikira kitari ugukekeranya. Rwose gukekeranya nta cyo byamara imbere y’ukuri. Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Umumenyi uhebuje w’ibyo bakora.
arabic: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ إِلَّا ظَنًّاۚ إِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā yattabiʿu aktharuhum illā ẓannan inna al-ẓana lā yugh'nī mina al-ḥaqi shayan inna al-laha ʿalīmun bimā yafʿalūna
